Class ComposedShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • ComposedShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Shape>, Shape

    public class ComposedShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shape
    ComposedShape is a composition of shapes that holds a container shape and small shape arrays that all fits in the container shape

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ComposedShape()
      any ComposedShape function makes a composed shape object depending on given container and small shape default constructor makes an empty rectangle
      ComposedShape(Circle containerShape, Circle smallShape) 
      ComposedShape(Circle containerShape, Rectangle smallShape) 
      ComposedShape(Circle containerShape, Triangle smallShape) 
      ComposedShape(Rectangle containerShape, Circle smallShape) 
      ComposedShape(Rectangle containerShape, Rectangle smallShape) 
      ComposedShape(Rectangle containerShape, Triangle smallShape) 
      ComposedShape(Triangle containerShape, Circle smallShape) 
      ComposedShape(Triangle containerShape, Rectangle smallShape) 
      ComposedShape(Triangle containerShape, Triangle smallShape) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double area() 
      int compareTo(Shape s) 
      ComposedShape decrement() 
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics g) 
      void drawComposed()
      drawComposed method is used in the drawAll method of ShapeHelper class if there is any composed object, this method is called and the composed shape is drawn in a new frame
      void drawContainer(java.awt.Graphics g) 
      ComposedShape increment() 
      void optimalFit(Circle containerShape, Circle smallShape) 
      void optimalFit(Circle containerShape, Rectangle smallShape) 
      void optimalFit(Circle containerShape, Triangle smallShape) 
      void optimalFit(Rectangle containerShape, Circle smallShape) 
      void optimalFit(Rectangle containerShape, Rectangle smallShape)
      any optimalFit function fits small shapes in the given container shape
      void optimalFit(Rectangle containerShape, Triangle smallShape) 
      void optimalFit(Triangle containerShape, Circle smallShape) 
      void optimalFit(Triangle containerShape, Rectangle smallShape) 
      void optimalFit(Triangle containerShape, Triangle smallShape) 
      double perimeter() 
      void print() 
      double restArea()
      restArea method gives the rest area after max small shapes fit in the container

      • drawComposed

        public void drawComposed()
        drawComposed method is used in the drawAll method of ShapeHelper class if there is any composed object, this method is called and the composed shape is drawn in a new frame
